sentence.Network_en: The volume of scheduled flights is straining the air traffic control system.
sentence.Network_cn: 定期航班的数量正让空中交通指挥系统不堪重负。

sentence.Network_en: He came to complain about the volume of the music.
sentence.Network_cn: 他过来抱怨音乐的音量太高了。

sentence.Network_en: Someone cranked up the volume of the public address system.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人调大了公共广播系统的音量。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally denoting a roll of parchment containing written matter): from Old French volum(e), from Latin volumen 'a roll', from volvere 'to roll'. An obsolete meaning 'size or extent (of a book') gave rise to sense 2

entry.def: The volume of something is the amount of it that there is.

example.ex: Senior officials will be discussing how the volume of sales might be reduced.
example.tran: 高层领导将要讨论销售量如何削减。

example.ex: ...the sheer volume of traffic and accidents.
example.tran: 交通流量之大、事故之多

entry.def: The volume of an object is the amount of space that it contains or occupies.

example.ex: It is 2,300 metres above sea level, so a given volume of air contains only about one-third as much oxygen as it would at sea level...
example.tran: 这是在海拔2,300米的高空，因此一定体积空气的含氧量只有海平面处的约1/3。

example.ex: When egg whites are beaten they can rise to seven or eight times their original volume.
example.tran: 蛋清打散后，体积可增至原来的七八倍。

entry.def: A volume is one book in a series of books.
A volume is a collection of several issues of a magazine, for example all the issues for one year.

entry.tran: （广播、电视或音响系统的）音量，声量,响度
entry.def: The volume of a radio, television, or sound system is the loudness of the sound it produces.

example.ex: He came to complain about the volume of the music.
example.tran: 他过来抱怨音乐的音量太高了。

entry.tran: 清楚表明;详尽说明;充分说明
entry.def: If something such as an action speaks volumes about a person or thing, it gives you a lot of information about them.

example.ex: What you wear speaks volumes about you...
example.tran: 你的衣着能传递很多关于你的信息。
他们的缺席已经充分说明了问题。

means.word_mean: 1. the amount of 3-dimensional space occupied by an object;

sentences.sentence: "the gas expanded to twice its original volume"

means.word_mean: 2. the property of something that is great in magnitude;

sentences.sentence: "it is cheaper to buy it in bulk"

means.word_mean: 3. physical objects consisting of a number of pages bound together;

sentences.sentence: "he used a large book as a doorstop"

means.word_mean: 4. a publication that is one of a set of several similar publications;

sentences.sentence: "he asked for the 1989 volume of the Annual Review"
"mix one volume of the solution with ten volumes of water"

means.word_mean: 6. the magnitude of sound (usually in a specified direction);

sentences.sentence: "the kids played their music at full volume"

auth_sentence.content: Then the volume of work grows on all levels.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then the volume of work grows on all levels.

stems_affixes.word_buile: evolution[n.进化,演变,发展,进展]+ism学术流派→n.进化论 adj.进化论的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 爱说话的, 有口才的, 流利的, 健谈的, [罕]易旋转的, 缠绕的

stems_affixes.word_buile: volume卷,册+inous多……的→多卷[册]的→长篇的
evolu=evolve[v.[使]发展;[使]进化;[使]进展]+tion表名词→n.进化,演变,发展,进展
evolution[n.进化,演变,发展,进展]+ism学术流派→n.进化论 adj.进化论的
re回,翻+volu转,卷+tion表名词→转翻→革命
volu转,卷+me→卷→一卷书[古时的书籍成卷形]
volu转,卷+te→n. 涡形;螺旋形;涡螺壳

sentences.en: For that article he has worked over some 30 volumes of Chinese history.
sentences.cn: 为了写那篇论文, 他仔细查阅了大约30册中国历史书。

sentences.en: Pressure varies directly with temperature and inversely with volume.
sentences.cn: 压力随温度成正比例变化, 与容积成反比例变化。

sentences.en: He turned up the volume on the television.
